header.title: Spaghetti Carbonara
header.text: A classic Italian pasta dish made with simple ingredients.

image.alt: Image of a mouth-watering pasta dish

steps.title: Step 1
steps.text: Cook the spaghetti in salted boiling water until al dente.

steps.title: Step 2
steps.text: Crisp the Panceta in a frying pan over medium heat.

steps.title: Step 3
steps.text: Whisk the eggs and cheese together in a bowl.

steps.title: Step 4
steps.text: Combine the drained pasta with panceta and mix with the egg mixture.

steps.title: Step 5
steps.text: Serve with freshly ground pepper and extra cheese.

header.title: Vegan Buddha Bowl
header.text: A nutritious and colorful bowl packed with wholesome ingredients.

image.alt: Image of a colorful salad bowl

ingredients.title: Quinoa
ingredients.text: 1 cup, cooked according to package instructions.

ingredients.title: Chickpeas
ingredients.text: 1 cup of canned or cooked chickpeas.

steps.title: Step 1
steps.text: Cook the quinoa according to package instructions.

steps.title: Step 2
steps.text: Roast the sweet potato until tender.

steps.title: Step 3
steps.text: Assemble the quinoa, chickpeas, and sweet potato in a bowl.

steps.title: Step 4
steps.text: Top with your favorite dressing and serve.

header.title: Chocolate Lava Cake
header.text: A rich and decadent dessert with a molten chocolate center.

image.alt: Image of a decadent chocolate dessert

steps.title: Step 1
steps.text: Preheat the oven to 200°C (400°F). Grease ramekins with butter and dust with cocoa powder.

steps.title: Step 2
steps.text: Melt the chocolate and butter together until smooth. Let it cool slightly.

steps.title: Step 3
steps.text: Whisk the eggs, yolks, and sugar until pale and fluffy. Fold in the chocolate mixture.

steps.title: Step 4
steps.text: Gently fold in the flour until fully combined.

steps.title: Step 5
steps.text: Pour the mixture into the prepared ramekins and bake for 10-12 minutes.

steps.title: Step 6
steps.text: Let the cakes cool for 1 minute, then carefully invert onto plates. Serve immediately.
